name: WOMENS CUTS
about: Hair is shaped and texturized to deliver the desired look and enhance face shape and highlight features. Includes shampoo, scalp massage, cut and blowdry style

name: MENS CUTS
about: Includes shampoo, scalp massage, cut and style

name: CHEMICAL WAVING
about: A safe way to achieve long-lasting curls or waves and reduce styling time. A gentle formula is applied to hair that has been wrapped to achieve a customized curl pattern.

name: ALL OVER COLOR
about: A solid tone is painted from root to tip. Includes blowdry style.

name: PARTIAL FOIL HIGHLIGHTS
about: Creates dimensional color using foils on the crown and front of the hair only. Includes gloss and blowdry style.

name: BALAYAGE/FOILAYAGE:
about: Both techniques may require a consultation to be priced and booked properly. Includes gloss and blowdry style.

name: BRIDAL STYLE
about: A custom look for the brides special day. Bridal clients must complete a consultation and trial before service.

name: STRENGTHENING TREATMENT
about: Protein treatment for extremely damaged and distressed hair. Includes blowdry style when not booked as an add-on service.
